title: Monospaced typewriter font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414195305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IRISGARDEN_6170.jpg)

Hi,

can anyone give me a hand in identifying this monospaced typewriter font?  
I've so far found a couple of close candidates, specifically URW Typewriter und Klim Pitch,  
but none are a complete match.

Many thanks,  
Ch

Font: 

 Typewriter MT Std 

Solved By: 

 [George Thomas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414195305/http:/typophile.com/user/803 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IRISGARDEN.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414195305/http:/typophile.com/files/IRISGARDEN.jpg) | 82.49 KB |
author: semiotic

comments.content: myfonts.com; search for "Typewriter" and look at the typewriter fonts from Monotype which should appear as the first search result. One of them looks to be a very close match to your sample.
